From: "Danny Byers" <mrbags@...>

also the bard that is at the fountain in skar is named Vhalen as in Van
Halen. The bard that you get the good sell prices from in Freeport is named
Jekel Enheid if my memory is correct.


>From: Andy Simpson <hornsfan@...>
>Subject: RE: (OT) The Day the Earth Stood Still (was: Bards questing)
>
> > From: Talies the Wanderer <snicker@...>
> >
> >
> > Speaking of Off-Topic, I've been thinking of compiling little "bits"
>like
> > that. Hidden "cute" things, almost Easter eggs, but not quite...
> > Things like, have you ever translated the side of the Qeynos
> > clocktower?* Or notice the fisherman named "Bait Masterson"?
> > Other little things like that.
>
>
>Or have you ever spelled Qeynos backwards? I was playing 6 months before I
>got that one. Yep, sometimes I'm a stupid bard.
>
>Anthem Dirgemaker
>Level 50 bard of Qeynos
>Solusek Ro
